name: ta-math
description: Technical analysis library in javascript. Calculates indicators and overlays from ohlcv data

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:bro
scripts.build:node: rollup src/ta-math.mjs -f cjs > ta-math.js && rollup test/test.mjs -f cjs > test.js
scripts.test: npm run build && node test.js | tap-spec

author: munrocket
